errors.error_description: The pip install command attempts to install a non-existent package named `sas-core`, which will cause the installation to fail.
correction_candidates: The package `sas-core` should be removed from the command.
The package `sas-core` should be replaced with `sasview`.
The package `sas-core` should be installed from GitHub directly.
The command should be `pip install sasview`, which installs all other dependencies.
errors.golden_answer: The package `sas-core` should be replaced with `sasview`.
